wordpressPost.title: Jonas Alaska plays for us
wordpressPost.excerpt: Jonas Alaska’s show at Øya 2011 made such a great impression on us that we just had to invite him back for next year. He celebrated by playing a song just for us before a recent gig at Kulturkirken Jakob in Oslo.
wordpressPost.content: Jonas Alaska’s show at Øya 2011 made such a great impression on us that we just had to invite him back for next year. He’s looking forward to playing one of our main stages, and celebrated the announcement by playing a song just for us before a recent gig at Kulturkirken Jakob in Oslo.
